meanings.sent1: Ferrimagnets are used in some types of magnets.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ferrimagnets to understand their magnetic properties.
meanings.sent3: The ferrimagnets at the science fair were attracting a lot of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her love for ferrimagnets was like a magnetic force pulling her in.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's demonstration with ferrimagnets made the concept easy to grasp.

meanings.definition: A type of magnetic material with opposing magnetic moments.
meanings.sent1: The ferrimagnets in the experiment showed interesting magnetic behavior.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers use ferrimagnets in various electronic devices.
meanings.sent3: The ferrimagnets in the fridge magnets were having a heated argument.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like ferrimagnets, always attracting and repelling.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ferrimagnets aligning perfectly stuck in his mind.
